serene.validation.schema.simplified
Class SimplifiedComponentBuilder

java.lang.Object
  serene.validation.schema.simplified.SimplifiedComponentBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentBuilder
public class SimplifiedComponentBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements ComponentBuilder

Builds components, the big picture SimplifiedModel is the directors responsibility. Can return/remove the components of the current level(usefull for attaching commands). Can check if the current level is top level.
